comment.author: 70251312@N00
comment._content:
November 29, 1913. Army sank the Navy and won the game, 22-9.
The game that Woodrow Wilson watched:
[http://www.flickr.com/photos/library_of_congress/4605957835/in/photostream/]

comment.author: 70251312@N00
comment._content:
West Point cadets enter the field:
[http://www.flickr.com/photos/library_of_congress/4647768476/in/photostream/]

Army's mascot is a mule. This one operated on double cadet power:
[http://www.flickr.com/photos/library_of_congress/4606572338/in/photostream/]

Navy's mascot is a goat:
[http://www.flickr.com/photos/library_of_congress/4606572166/]
